title: Add epic management UI (create, edit, delete)
description:
Complete epic CRUD operations in plugin UI.

**Current:** No way to create, edit, or delete epics from UI.

**Required:**
- CreateEpicDialog.kt (form: title, description, architectureNotes, rails)
- Edit epic via dialog (reuse CreateEpicDialog)
- Delete epic with confirmation
- "+" button in epic row header
- Right-click context menu on epic chips
definitionOfDone: Can create new epics from UI
